title: Mixed reception in WI's medical community amid push to license, regulate naturopathy
author: Naomi Kowles
description: MADISON, Wis. — Naturopathy could soon become recognized and regulated in Wisconsin, now that a bill regulating it has cleared both the Assembly and Senate. While the measure has bipartisan support, the reception among Wisconsin's medical communities is mixed. An alternative family medicine with an emphasis on natural remedies, 23 states offer licensing or registration for naturopathic doctors-largely in New England and in the West.
